mapper.insert: MERGE INTO NOTICE N USING DUAL ON(N.NOTICE_TYPE='I' AND USER_NO=#{mNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET NOTICE_CONTENT=#{nContent},NOTICE_DATE=SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES(SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL,#{mNo},#{nTitle},#{nContent},#{nType},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE USER_NO=#{mNo} AND NOTICE_TYPE='I'
SELECT NOTICE_TITLE,NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE USER_NO=#{mNo} AND NOTICE_TYPE='AR'
